SQL.LOAD: SELECT service_class_id, service_type_id, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, is_deductible_id, is_standard_id, contains_deductible_id, service_class_type_id FROM elp_service_class_type WHERE service_class_type_id = :service_class_type_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT service_class_id, service_type_id, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, is_deductible_id, is_standard_id, contains_deductible_id, service_class_type_id FROM elp_service_class_type
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_service_class_type SET service_class_id = :service_class_id, service_type_id = :service_type_id, is_deductible_id = :is_deductible_id, is_standard_id = :is_standard_id, contains_deductible_id =:contains_deductible_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE service_class_type_id = :service_class_type_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_service_class_type ( service_class_id, service_type_id, is_deductible_id, is_standard_id, created_by, service_class_type_id, contains_deductible_id ) VALUES ( :service_class_id, :service_type_id, :is_deductible_id, :is_standard_id, :created_by, :service_class_type_id, :contains_deductible_id )
